Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Swiss_Prot Entry C0HJB8]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli HP101BA (MIC=6.4 µM), Klebsiella pneumoniae PTCC1388 (MIC=7.3 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus PTCC1625 (MIC=4.7 µM), Staphylococcus aureus PTCC1431 (MIC=5.3 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.Int J Pept Res Ther(2012)18;107.]<3% hemolytic activity at 60 µg/ml against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity. Has no or very limited (<3%) hemolytic activity at concentrations of 15 µg/ml and 60 µg/ml.

Literature.Title: Identification and characterization of novel antibacterial peptides from skin secretions of Euphlyctis cyanophlyctis.
Literature.Author: oodeh A, Ghorani-Azam A, Chamani JK.
